items.title: Centreon Extends Monitoring Reach into Observability Realm
items.summary: Centreon has expanded its monitoring capabilities by releasing an open source monitoring agent that integrates OpenTelemetry, allowing for unified monitoring and observability across IT and OT environments.

items.title: Why a VC is betting AI is 'the opposite of social media' and will forge more human connections
items.summary: Menlo Ventures partners predict AI will create more human connections and are eyeing opportunities in consumer startups amid the growing adoption of AI.

items.title: GSA plans to optimize operations following cost-cutting, agency head says
items.summary: GSA plans to optimize operations to become more efficient and effective while prioritizing the American taxpayer.

items.title: Amazon trims workforce in Cloud Division AWS citing rising AI-driven costs: Report
items.summary: Amazon is reducing its workforce in the Cloud Division AWS due to rising AI-driven costs, following CEO Andy Jassy's focus on automation to streamline operations.

items.title: Nothing Updates the Essential Space With 3 Big Improvements
items.summary: The Essential Space by Nothing has received 3 big improvements to differentiate its most recent phones, although execution may still need improvement. There is potential for further enhancements to optimize the Essential Space feature.

items.title: Walmart Extends US Supply Chain Changes to Global Operations
items.summary: Walmart is reengineering its global supply chain with a focus on automation and real-time artificial intelligence (AI), extending proven U.S. technologies globally for faster and smarter operations.

items.title: Andy Byron, Kristin Cabot's company Astronomer is AI-Airflow data firm, tie up with over 80,000 - all about Astronomer Inc
items.summary: Andy Byron and Kristin Cabot's company Astronomer, an AI-Airflow data firm, has tied up with over 80,000 collaborators. A video clip of them from a Coldplay concert has gone viral, showcasing their work at Astronomer Inc.

items.title: Congress’ AI moratorium isn’t dead yet, Rep. McCormick says
items.summary: Advocates are still pushing for the passage of a provision preventing states from enforcing AI regulations, despite it not making it into the final reconciliation law.

items.title: Integrating MuleSoft with Einstein AI and Prompt Templates Using the MAC Project
items.summary: Integrating MuleSoft with Einstein AI and Prompt Templates Using the MAC Project allows developers to easily configure and manage AI agents within Anypoint Studio or Anypoint Code Builder.

items.title: Waymo and Tesla Austin Robotaxi Competition
items.summary: Waymo and Tesla are expanding their robotaxi services in Austin, with Waymo now serving a larger area than Tesla. Both companies are expected to serve the entire City of Austin within 2-6 weeks.

items.title: Truth Social announces a companion AI. Avatar choices include Kimberly Guilfoyle and Conker the Squirrel [Awkward]
items.summary: Truth Social announces a companion AI with avatar choices like Kimberly Guilfoyle and Conker the Squirrel.

items.title: Show HN: Claude‑CMD – A CLI for managing Claude Code commands and workflows
items.summary: Built an open-source CLI called Claude‑CMD for managing Claude Code commands and workflows, designed to streamline interaction with AI-driven workflows in coding tasks and automation.

items.title: Slack Gives Paid Users Access to More AI Tools
items.summary: Slack gives paid users access to more AI tools to help them focus on high-value work and stay organized.

items.title: Video and transcript of talk on "Can goodness compete?"
items.summary: Video and transcript of a talk discussing long-term equilibria post-AGI and whether goodness can compete, presented at Mox in San Francisco in July 2025.

items.title: Elon Musk says a male Grok companion is coming, with a personality inspired by 'Twilight' and '50 Shades of Grey'
items.summary: Elon Musk teases a male Grok companion with a personality inspired by 'Twilight' and '50 Shades of Grey', following the release of xAI's anime waifu and red panda companions.

items.title: PepsiCo to Streamline Operations Amid Higher Supply Chain Costs
items.summary: PepsiCo is focusing on productivity initiatives and brand innovation to address increased supply chain costs caused by tariffs and maintain sales in North America amidst flat performance.

items.title: Chip Maker TSMC Boosts Outlook for Revenue Amid Strong AI Demand
items.summary: Chip Maker TSMC boosts revenue outlook due to strong AI demand.

items.title: Fascism For First Time Founders
items.summary: Concerns about the alignment of tech and startup communities with neoreactionary views and support for Trump raises ethical questions about the values and beliefs promoted in the industry.

items.title: Pixel Watch 4 may finally allow for repairs, but the details are incredibly vague - 9to5Google
items.summary: Pixel Watch 4 may allow for repairs with vague details and will use the same processor as previous models.

items.title: Trump’s tariffs are turning into a ‘mosaic’ that will be ‘idiosyncratic,’ Morgan Stanley says, projecting a $2.7 trillion haul over 10 years
items.summary: Trump's tariffs could result in a $2.7 trillion haul over 10 years, leading to higher import prices, fueling inflation, and potentially squeezing corporate margins.

items.title: AMD launches Threadripper Pro 9000 WX-series CPUs with up to 96 Zen 5 cores for $11,699 — Shimada Peak and Radeon AI Pro R9700 arrive on July 23
items.summary: AMD launches Threadripper Pro 9000 WX-series CPUs with up to 96 Zen 5 cores for $11,699 — Shimada Peak and Radeon AI Pro R9700 arrive on July 23, sharing pricing and release date for professional and workstation users.

items.title: ChatGPT Will Soon Shop Online, Make PowerPoints On Your Behalf
items.summary: OpenAI is enhancing ChatGPT to perform various tasks like online shopping and creating presentations for users, as part of its effort to make AI agents more accessible to the general public.

items.title: Google adds new features in Search as AI race intensifies
items.summary: Google adds new GenAI features and business calling system to Search in response to increasing competition in AI search.

items.title: Kinder Morgan kicks off oil and gas earnings season with a bullish outlook, in part thanks to thirsty data centers
items.summary: Kinder Morgan's bullish outlook for oil and gas earnings is attributed in part to data centers, with the biggest driver of natural gas demand being exports and the rapid buildout of LNG terminals.

items.title: Why the Gates Foundation and Other Funders Are Spending $1 Billionon AI for Frontline Workers
items.summary: The Gates Foundation and other funders are investing $1 billion in a new entity called NextLadder Ventures to develop AI solutions for frontline workers such as public defenders, parole officers, and social workers.

items.title: For a Look at the Future of Work, These Startups Combine AI, Robots, and People
items.summary: The age of the human-only workplace may be coming to an end as startups combine AI, robots, and people. A farms and a construction company offer a preview of what's to come.

items.title: OpenAI Hires Entire Team From AI Startup Backed By Shopify And Radical Ventures 'To Ensure AGI Benefits All Of Humanity'
items.summary: OpenAI hires entire team from AI startup Crossing Minds, backed by Shopify and Radical Ventures, to ensure AGI benefits all of humanity after raising $13.5 million and spending 8 years building personalized AI shopping technology.

items.title: Logistics Viewpoints Weekly News: From Reactive to Real-Time – Supply Chains Rewrite the Rules
items.summary: Logistics industry transitioning from legacy systems to real-time orchestration and intelligent automation, rewriting supply chain rules.

items.title: What Big Tech got out of Trump’s Big Beautiful Bill
items.summary: The One Big Beautiful Bill Act signed into law by President Donald Trump on Independence Day benefits Big Tech by including provisions that could significantly impact the industry's largest players.

items.title: Aerospace Ceramics Market Forecast to 2029: Advancing High-Performance Materials
items.summary: Aerospace ceramics are forecasted to advance high-performance materials in the aerospace industry, improving fuel economy and enabling innovation in engines, spacecraft, and defense systems.

items.title: You Can Call a Self-Driving Lucid Gravity EV Through Uber Starting in 2026
items.summary: Luxury electric car maker Lucid will provide Uber with 20,000 self-driving Gravity SUVs for a premium rideshare option starting in 2026.

items.title: sherlock-ai 1.5.0
items.summary: sherlock-ai 1.5.0 is a new Python package offering performance monitoring, logging utilities, and code analysis for developers to use in their AI projects.

items.title: AI For Cybersecurity Is Advancing, But Users Need To Trust It
items.summary: Advancements in AI for cybersecurity are being made, but user trust is crucial. Other topics in the newsletter include Nvidia's market value, a quick settlement in a Facebook lawsuit, and Perplexity's new AI web browser.

items.title: Merchant of Record Firm Paddle Raises $25 Million to Fund Expansion
items.summary: Merchant of Record Firm Paddle raises $25 million to fund expansion for digital product companies.

items.title: Do later what can be done now
items.summary: Procrastination can be a powerful asset in investing, especially in a world obsessed with instant action. The 'proxinator' thrives by delaying decisions, avoiding hype-driven mistakes, and sidestepping market crashes.

items.title: Andy Byron and Kristin Cabot: What we know about the viral clip, marriage, and the company
items.summary: Astronomer CEO Andy Byron and his HR head Kristin Cabot faced public scrutiny after being caught on the kiss cam at a Coldplay concert, raising questions about appropriate workplace relationships.

items.title: Kinder Morgan kicks off oil and gas earnings season with a bullish outlook, in part thanks to thirsty data centers
items.summary: Kinder Morgan is optimistic about oil and gas earnings season, citing the increased demand from data centers as a factor for growth. The company's focus on building pipelines to support data center growth across various states contributes to their bullish outlook.

items.title: News publishers take paywall-blocker 12ft.io offline

items.title: Why Culture Amp Launched an AI-Powered Coaching Tool
items.summary: Culture Amp launched an AI-powered coaching tool to provide support for managers and employees based on survey and sentiment data.

items.summary: NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii, a side-scrolling puzzle platformer, will be launching for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions in addition to its previously announced PC version.

items.title: CORRECTION - Ad Age lists Advantage Solutions among 2025 Largest Agencies
items.summary: Advantage Solutions has been listed as the 9th largest agency company in North America and No. 18 worldwide by Ad Age, according to the latest Agency Report.

items.summary: Corey Feldman uses AI technology to create clones of himself singing characters from his past roles in a music video to celebrate his 54th birthday.

items.summary: $90 billion AI investments, MLB robot umpires, and more tech news highlighted by Aly Lopez, including an EcoFlow home battery backup system and AI data center investments.

items.summary: Wear OS offers a variety of features including apps, Google services integration, and health tracking capabilities that make it deserving of more attention.

items.title: Ampco-Pittsburgh Insiders Show Steady Backing Amid Credit Facility Secured
items.summary: Ampco-Pittsburgh Corporation insiders are showing steady backing as the company secures a credit facility. The company is one of the 10 Metal Stocks with Insider Buying in 2025.

items.title: AWS AI League: Learn, innovate, and compete in our new ultimate AI showdown
items.summary: AWS AI League is a program that combines fun competition and hands-on learning with AWS AI services to help organizations upskill their workforce and gain valuable skills.

items.summary: Canon is rolling out a major firmware update for its EOS lineup, including the flagship EOS R1, introducing new features like Panning Assist and enhanced Servo.
